verses.verse: The <S%G3588><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> unto the elect <S%G1588><s%> lady <S%G2959><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G848><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> love <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the truth; <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> only, <S%G3441><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> they that have known <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth; <S%G225><s%>

For the truth's sake, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G225><s%> which dwelleth <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> forever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G3029><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I found <S%G2147><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we have received <S%G2983><s%> a commandment <S%G1785><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I beseech <S%G2065><s%> thee, <S%G4571><s%> lady, <S%G2959><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we had <S%G2192><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G848><s%> commandments. <S%G1785><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye have heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> ye should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> deceivers <S%G4108><s%> are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> who confess <S%G3670><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is come <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh. <S%G4561><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a deceiver <S%G4108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an antichrist. <S%G500><s%>

Look to <S%G991><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we lose <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> we have wrought, <S%G2038><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that we receive <S%G618><s%> a full <S%G4134><s%> reward. <S%G3408><s%>

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> transgresseth, <S%G3845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> He that abideth <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>

If there come any <S%G1536><s%> <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your house, <S%G3614><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> bid <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> Godspeed: <S%G5463><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> he that biddeth <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> Godspeed <S%G5463><s%> is partaker <S%G2841><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> I would <S%G1014><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> write with <S%G1223><s%> paper <S%G5489><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ink: <S%G3188><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> face to face, <S%G4750><s%> <S%G4314><s%> <S%G4750><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> full. <S%G4137><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
